caption:
The photograph captures a man seated inside a technological equipment-filled environment, likely a vehicle such as an airplane, given the appearance of cockpit controls visible in the background. The man appears middle-aged with dark hair and a serious expression. He is wearing a light-colored long-sleeve shirt and is focused on adjusting or operating a gray metallic machine in front of him.

The machine has various components including what appears to be gauges, meters, and various controls, housed within a tall metal structure that supports multiple electronic devices stacked on top of each other. There are visible wires and tubes connecting different parts of the equipment, suggesting a complex setup.

The background includes additional complex electronic equipment and dials, characteristic of an aircraft control panel, indicating that the man might be engaged in navigation, communication, or another form of technical operation. The overall scene suggests a technical operation or testing, where precision and attention to details are critical.
title: Dr. James N. Pitts, director of Air Pollution Research Center with monitoring equipment inside NASA plane
